00007 template <class TYPE> class SmartPtrArray : public CArray<TYPE*> {
00008 public:
00009         // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00010         INT_PTR Add(TYPE* newElement) {
00011                 return CArray<TYPE*>::Add(newElement);          
00012         }
00013         // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00014         INT_PTR AddCopy(TYPE* newElement) {
00015                 TYPE* copy = new TYPE(*newElement);
00016                 return CArray<TYPE*>::Add(copy);                
00017         }
00018         // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00019         void RemoveAt(INT_PTR nIndex, INT_PTR nCount = 1) {
00020                 for (int i=0;i<nCount;i++)
00021                         delete GetAt( nIndex+i );
00022                 CArray<TYPE*>::RemoveAt(nIndex, nCount);
00023         }
00024         // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00025         void RemoveAll() {
00026                 for(int i=0; i < GetCount(); i++ )
00027                         delete GetAt( i );
00028                 CArray<TYPE*>::RemoveAll();
00029         }
00030         // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00031         void RemoveAllPointers() {
00032                 CArray<TYPE*>::RemoveAll();
00033         }
00034         // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00035         void Copy(const SmartPtrArray& src) {
00036                 int mi = min(GetCount(), src.GetCount());
00037                 int ma = max(GetCount(), src.GetCount());
00038                 for(int i = 0; i < mi; i++ )
00039                         SetAt(i, src[i]);
00040                 
00041                 if (GetCount() < src.GetCount()) {
00042                         for(int i = mi; i < ma; i++ )
00043                                 AddCopy(src[i]);
00044                 }
00045                 else {
00046                         RemoveAt(mi, ma-mi);
00047                 }
00048         }
00049         // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00050         void SetAt(INT_PTR nIndex, TYPE* newElement) {
00051                 delete GetAt( nIndex );
00052                 CArray<TYPE*>::SetAt(nIndex, new TYPE(*newElement));
00053         }
00054         // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00055         bool In(TYPE* n) {
00056                 for (int i=0;i < GetCount();i++)
00057                         if ((*GetAt(i)) == n)
00058                                 return true;
00059                 return false;
00060         }
00061         // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00062         int Find(TYPE* n) {
00063                 for (int i=0;i < GetCount();i++)
00064                         if ((*GetAt(i)) == n)
00065                                 return i;
00066                 return -1;
00067         }
00068         // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00069         void Sort() {
00070                 for (int i=0;i<GetCount();i++)
00071                         for (int j=i+1;j<GetCount();j++) {
00072                                 if (GetAt(j-1)->Compare(GetAt(j)) > 0) {
00073                                         TYPE* temp = GetAt(j-1);
00074                                         GetAt(j-1) = GetAt(j);
00075                                         GetAt(j) = temp;
00076                                 }
00077                         }
00078         }
00079         // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00080 };
